A lo largo de su vida, Enrique ha trabajado en muchos oficios, actualmente se decida al trabajo de la albañilería y es muy solicitado por sus vecinos, cuando se tiene que techar o tarrajear una pared de alguna casa de la ciudad de Pucallpa. Él es el albañil con más experiencia, al que todos recurren. Disfruta mucho la actividad de construcción que realiza, sabe que con esta digna profesión puede brindarle una buena vida a su esposa. Lleva 12 años realizando esta profesión y considera que lo más difícil de su trabajo es cargar los pesados ladrillos y tener que manejar el cemento hasta con las manos, y eso ha provocado que se dañen más su piel. Por ello solicita de su ayuda para poder comprar nuevas herramientas y con ello mejorar el trabajo que ejecuta. Este sería su décimo primer crédito con MFP y por tal no quiere dejar de pagar sus cuotas, por ello busca más trabajo para ganar más dinero y cumplir con ustedes. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará tablas de madera y comprar más  puntales metálicos, con lo cual podrá trabajar en construcciones.
texts.en: Enrique is a very sincere and hard-working 49-year-old man. He lives in his own home along with his wife Gladis, 44, and is willing to work very hard to improve their quality of life. For most of his life, Enrique has worked in many trades. He currently makes a living in construction and is very sought-after by his neighbors when they need to put up a roof or a wall at some home in the city of Pucallpa. He is the worker with the most experience, so everyone comes to him. He really enjoys the work that he does and knows that with this dignified profession he can provide his wife with a good life. He has been doing this job for 12 years, and the thing he considers to be the most difficult is carrying the heavy bricks and having to work with the cement with his hands, which has cause a lot of damage to his skin. He is requesting your help so he can purchase new tools to better carry out his work. This will be his 10th loan with Kiva partner MFP, and he doesn't want to default on his payments so he can continue looking for more work and making more money and do right by the people who made this loan possible. With the loan of 1,500 soles he is requesting, he plans to purchase wooden planks and metal post so he will be able to do construction jobs.

loans.use: to purchase wooden planks and metal posts.

loans.name: Eulogia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Eulogia; ella tiene 53 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de pasto y negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes, pollos y chanchos y el negocio de venta de pasto lo vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m y los animales lo vende en los distintos mercados, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de pasto y negocio de crianza de animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pasto y comprar alimentos para los animales.                
                                                      
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Eulogia belongs to the “Kanchary” Communal Bank, located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

She is 53 years old, married, and has 2 children. Eulogia alternates her daily activities between her business of selling fodder and raising animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, and pigs, without a fixed stall, from 5:00 am until 10:00 pm. She sells in distinct local markets.

Eulogia wants to expand both her feed business and her raising and selling of animals. She is requesting a loan to buy fodder and feed for her animals.

Eulogia is happy about the loan and commits herself to complying with her payments.

loans.use: to buy fodder to sell and food supplies for the animals she raises and sells.

loans.name: Yaneth Lourdes

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yaneth Lourdes; ella tiene 24 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de queso, ella vende queso en forma independiente desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m y por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de queso. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar insumos para preparar el queso como leche.                                        
                              
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Yaneth Lourdes belongs to the Kanchary Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Yaneth Lourdes, age 24, is single and has one child.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling cheese.  She sells cheese in an independent manner from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  It is through this business that she gets her child ahead.  

She wants to expand her business of selling cheese.  She is requesting a loan to buy supplies like milk to make cheese.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy supplies like milk to make cheese.

loans.name: Munafa Development Group

texts.en:
Isata is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs.  She was born in a place called Shenama in eastern Sierra Leone.  She is 38 years of age.  Isata is married to a tailor and the couple has 2 children – 1 is not yet of school-age and the other is in secondary school. 

For 12 years now, Isata has been selling palm oil (the most popular cooking oil in the region) and beans. This is the first loan that Isata and her group members have applied for from SMT/Kiva lenders.  With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions.  

Isata will use her share of the loan (SLL 500,000) to expand her business – she will buy palm oil and beans in large quantity to add to her business.

loans.use: buy palm oil and beans

loans.name: Unidad Las Cañas Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "Unidad las Cañas", porque así se llama la unidad habitacional donde se reúne el grupo. Esta ubicado en el estado de Morelos, México. El grupo está conformado por 9 integrantes y es la octava vez que solicitan un prestamo. Guadalupe es una integrante del grupo. Ella tiene 34 años de edad y estudio hasta la secundaria, vive en unión libre y se dedica a la venta de zapatos por catalogo, negocio que inició hace 6 años en el cual le ha ido muy bien y tiene muchos pedidos. Solicita el préstamo para comprar más mercancía (zapatillas, huaraches y tenis etc.) sus clientes la prefieren porque los atiende muy bien además de que en su venta de zapatos les da los mejores precios y de muy buena calidad. Al momento de solicitar este préstamo se siente contenta por la oportunidad de continuar haciendo crecer su negocio. Quiere este prestamo para comprar más zapatos para su negocio y entregar los pedidos que tiene. Con las ganancias obtenidas quiere comprar una mesa para su casa y apoyar en la economia de su hogar.
texts.en:
This group is called "Unidad las Cañas" because that’s the name of the housing unit this group meets in.  It’s located in the state of Morelos, México.  The group has nine members and this is the 8th time they’ve requested a loan.

Guadalupe is one of the group members.  She is 34 years old and completed secondary school.  She lives in a free union and sells shoes via catalogue, a business she started six years ago and in which she’s done very well; she has many pending orders.  

She is asking for this loan to buy more merchandise (sandals, slippers, tennis shoes, etc).  Her customers prefer her because she treats them very well and because she sells high quality shoes for very good prices. 

At the moment of requesting the loan she feels very happy for the opportunity to continue growing in her business.  She wants the loan to buy more shoes to fill her pending orders.  She wants to use profits obtained from the sales to buy a table for her home and to contribute to her household’s economy.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (shoes, sandals and tennis shoes)

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La señora Rosa Lisbeth  es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora de 30 años quien tiene un salón de belleza desde hace tres años  el cual inicio con unos ahorros que tenia de su trabajo en belleza (pistoliados, manicure, pedicure, alisados…etc.) a domicilio. Además de su salón hace dos años tiene una pequeña pulpería.
Ella invertirá para poner aparte su salón con una mejor instalación para comodidad de sus clientas.
texts.en:
Rosa Lisbeth is a hard working, enterprising, 30-year-old woman who has had a beauty salon for the last three years that she started with savings she earned providing in-home beauty services (highlighting, manicure, pedicure, hair straightening, etc).  Aside from her beauty salon, she’s also had a small grocery store for the last two years.

She will invest her loan in making her beauty salon stand-alone for increased comfort of her customers.

loans.use: to make her beauty salon independent.

loans.name: Evelia Del Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Evelia del Carmen es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora de 48 años quien se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en el mercado de Masaya desde hace 20 años. Ella inicio con la venta de bananos luego fue viendo cómo se movía el mercado y empezó a comprar lo que estaba en flota que es más barato.
Ella tiene ocho hijos pero a su cargo solo tiene dos uno de 22 años quien está en su último año de Banca y Finanza y  uno 10 años que está en primaria. Evelia invertirá el crédito en la cosecha de mamon.
texts.en:
Evelia del Carmen is a hardworking and entrepreneurial 48-year-old woman. For 20 years she has sold fruits and vegetables in the market in Masaya. She started out selling bananas; she observed how the market worked and began to buy what was in season because it's cheapest.

She has 8 children but only two are still in her care; one is 22 and is in their final year studying banking and finance, the other is 10 and in primary school.

Evelia will invest the loan in the mamon harvest.

loans.use: to harvest mamon [a fruit similar to lychee]

loans.name: Aurora Helena

texts.es: Aurora es una madre de familia de 40 años, su actividad es una  pulpería ésta actividad la realiza desde hace un poco más de 2 años. Ella ofrece productos para el hogar, de limpieza, golosinas granos básicos y con estos ingresos que obtiene se ayuda para sacar adelante a sus hijos. A solicitado un crédito para comprar granos básicos, sopas, enlatados, detergentes, galletas y mercadería como ropa para diferentes edades, ya que en su barrio las personas que le compran le han comentado que sería bueno que también venda otras cosas. Aurora es una persona muy conocida por ser una mujer trabajadora, alegre, responsable y una buena madre al querer brindarles un mejor futuro para los sus hijos.
texts.en:
Aurora is a 40 year old mother who runs a small grocery store. She has been doing this for a little more than 2 years. She offers domestic goods, cleaning products, snacks, and basic food items. With the money that she earns she helps her children to get ahead.

She has asked for a loan to buy basic grains, soups, canned goods, detergents, cookies and other merchandise like clothing for different ages, because the customers in her neighborhood have commented that it would be good if she also sold other things

Aurora is well-known for being a hard-working, happy and responsible woman and a good mother who wants to give her children a better future.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, soups, canned goods, detergents, cookies and merchandise like clothing.

loans.name: Misael

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Misael; el tiene 27 años de edad y es soltero; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de confección de ternos y también trabaja en el negocio de internet desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m y la confección de ternos lo realiza en forma independiente vendiendo y confeccionando al publico que realiza pedidos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de confección de ternos y negocio de internet. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales como telas para confeccionar los ternos y para implementar el internet.                           
                             
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Misael belongs to the community bank 'Kanchary', located in the district of Cusco, a part of the Cusco province in the department of Cusco.

Misael is 27 years old and single. Each day he alternates between making suits and working in an internet cafe from 8am until 6pm. He works independently making and selling suits to order according to customer demand. He would like to expand and improve both of his businesses. He has applied for a loan to buy fabric to make suits and to install the internet.

Misael is happy to be receiving this loan and promises to make his loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy fabric to make suits and to install the internet.

loans.name: Juana Lucia

texts.es:
La señora Juana Lucia es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora de 31 años. Ella es maestra de primaria en la escuela Nicarao de Diria desde hace 4 años profesión que ama. 
La maestra Juana es casada tiene dos niños uno de 12 y una niña de 1 año y el crédito lo quiere para reparar su casa ya que con las lluvias el agua se le puede meter además desea embaldosar.
El sueño de ella es llegar a tener una moto que le permita movilizarse en los centros de estudios en los que trabaja.
texts.en:
Juana Lucia is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman of 31 years. She has been a primary school teacher at Nicarao de Diria for 4 years, a job that she loves.

Teacher Juana is married and has two children, one who's 12 and a 1 year old girl. She wants the loan to repair her house because water can get in when it rains. She also wants to put down tile.

Her dream is to have a motorbike that will allow her to get around to the schools where she works.

loans.use: to set up her house.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es: Felipe tiene  55 años, es un hombre muy amable, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposa Rayda de 54 años y está dispuesto a trabajar muy duro, pues espera en el futuro vivir una vejez tranquila. Desde muy joven Felipe se interesó por la carpintería y la mecánica es por eso que decidió aprender y ejecutar esta profesión. Actualmente tiene su propio taller de carpintería y mecánica y le va muy bien, tiene muchos pedidos para cumplir y sabe que tiene que cumplirlos todos, si quiere que su negocio siga creciendo. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es moldear la madera y sacar los diseños que él quiere. Lleva 34 años en éste trabajo y considera que lo más difícil es darle los toques finales a los trabajos, ya que le toma mucho tiempo. Anhela que con el tiempo su negocio crezca y se convierta en una de las carpinterías y mecánicas más conocidas de la ciudad de Pucallpa, por ello pide su ayuda para que pueda cumplir sus objetivos. Este sería el segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que esta dispuesto a pagar a tiempo sus cuotas,  ya que no quiere causarle problemas a su banco comunal, en donde es muy respetuoso con el resto de socias. Con los mil quinientos nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más madera, tubos y fierros para fabricar nuevos muebles y así cumplir con sus pedidos.
texts.en:
Felipe is 55 and a very friendly man. He lives in his own home together with his wife Rayda, 54. He isn't afraid to work very hard, because he hopes one day to be able to relax in his old age. Since he was very young, Felipe had an interest in carpentry and mechanics, which is why he decided to learn and make it his profession. Currently he has his own carpentry and mechanical workshop and it's going very well. He has a lot of order to fill and knows that he has to finish them all if he wants his business to keep growing. What he likes most about his work is shaping the wood and getting the designs that he wants. He has been doing this for 34 years and considers the most difficult aspect to be making the final touches on the work, since it takes a lot of time. 

He longs for his business to grow with time and become one of the most well-known carpentry and mechanics workshops in the city of Pucallpa. He asks for help so that he can meet his objectives. This will be his second loan with MFP, and he is ready to make his payments on time since he doesn't want to cause problems for his village bank, where he is well-respected by the other members. With the 1500 nuevos soles that he has requested, he will buy more wood, tubes and iron to make new furniture and complete his orders.

loans.use: to buy more wood, tubes and iron for making furniture.

loans.name: Blessing Group

texts.en:
Lucy is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs.  She was born in Kenema, a city in eastern Sierra Leone. She is 39 years of age. Lucy is married to a diamond miner and the couple has 1 child who is attending secondary school.

For over 20 years now, Lucy has been selling palm oil (the most popular cooking oil in the region). This is the first loan that Lucy and her group members have applied for from SMT/Kiva lenders. With the help of this loan, they will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. 

Lucy will use her share of the loan (SLL 500,000) to expand her business – she will buy gallons of palm oil to add to her business.

loans.use: buy palm oil

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ana Cecilia; ella tiene 55 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida y también se dedica a vender productos de belleza como lápiz labiales, cremas y perfumes, ella vende en forma independiente y el negocio de venta de comida también lo realiza en forma ambulatoria, por medio de estos pequeños negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de comida y negocio de venta de productos de belleza. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos de belleza y productos para cocinar. 
                                                                     
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Ana Cecilia belongs to the Kanchary Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Ana Cecilia, age 55, is single and has three children.  She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling food.  She also sells beauty products like lipstick, cream, and perfume.  She sells both the beauty products and the food in an itinerant manner.  It is through these small businesses that she gets her children ahead.

She wants to expand and improve her business of selling food and her business of selling beauty prodcuts.  She is requesting the loan to buy beauty products and cooking supplies.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy beauty products and cooking supplies.

loans.name: Marie Elise

texts.fr:
Femme mariée de 37ans et mère de 5 enfants dont l’âge varie entre 17ans et 8ans est dans la vente des beignets il y a 14ans, ce commerce lui a permis à contribuer aux taches ménagères.
Par jour, elle a des ventes de 18000f et son activité est située dans un coin a l’entrée d’un centre de soins de santé  ou les clients sont diversifiés.
Avec ce prêt, elle veut augmenter son stock en achetant, 1sac de farine, 1sac de sucre, 1sac de maïs, 1bidon de 10litre d’huile, 2 paquet de levure boulangère.
Son projet est de faire une unité de pâtisserie avec livraison et pour cela, elle veut beaucoup vendre, Réaliser des bénéfices considérables, épargner, afin de sollicité un prêt plus important à l’avenir.
Comme une mère avertie, elle encourage ses filles  à faire la  même activité quand elles  sont en vacances.
texts.en:
A married woman for 37 years and mother of 5 children whose ages vary from 25 to 40 years, she has been selling fritters for 14 years. This business has enabled her to contribute to the household tasks.
Every day, she makes sales for 18000 f and her stall is situated in a corner at the entrance to a health care center where the customers are of diverse origin.
With this loan, she wishes to increase her stock by purchasing ; 1 sack of flour,1 sack of sugar,1 sack of corn,1 can of 10 liters of  oil and 2 packets of baker’s yeast.
Her plan is to create a pastry company offering delivery and with this in mind, she wants to make a lot of sales, make considerable profits and save up in order to request a larger loan in the future.
As an experienced mother, she encourages her daughters to do the same activity when they are on holiday.

loans.use: purchase : a sack of flour,a sack of sugar,a can of oil,yeast and a sack of corn.

loans.name: Julio Demetrio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “KANCHARY”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Julio Demetrio; el tiene 71 años de edad y es viudo y tiene 6 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de librería y el negocio de internet, el socio en el negocio de librería vende lapiceros,colores,cuadernos y entre otros útiles escolares y el negocio de internet trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m y por medio de estos pequeños negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de internet y negocio de librería. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar algunos repuestos de su computadora y para comprar mercadería para la librería.
                                          
              
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Julio Demetrio belongs to the Kanchary Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Julio Demetrio, age 71, is a widower; and he has six children.  He alternates his daily activities with his bookstore and his Internet business.  He sells pencils, crayons, notebooks, and other school supplies.  He works in his Internet business from 8:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m.  It is through these small businesses that he gets his children ahead.

He wants to expand and improve his Internet business and his bookstore business.  He is requesting the loan to buy some computer replacement parts and to buy merchandise for his bookstore.

He is happy about the loan, and he pledges to make his payments.

loans.use: to buy some computer replacement parts and to buy merchandise for his bookstore.

loans.name: Alda

texts.pt:
Natural do Distrito de Inharrime, Provincia de Inhambane, Sul de Moçambique, casada e maê de 6 filhos de idades entre 21 a 36 anos de idade, os dois mais novos que vivem com ela ainda continuam a estudar. Fez 6ª classe do antigo sistema de educação e naõ continuou devido a dificuldades financeiras. Vive na casa propria e sustenta um neto e sobrinho que vivem com ela. 

Saiu de Inharrime para Maputo com a sua familia ainda menor de idade, tem uma area agricola de cerca de 2 hectares onde com ajuda de um empregado produz horticolas ha mais de 10 anos. Neste trabalho consegue um rendimento de cerca de 3.000.00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e ainda poupa.

Nunca  teve emprestimo em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku atraves de colegas que são clientes desta instituição. Este é o seu quarto emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000mt com o qual pretende comprar insumos agricolas (sementes, fertelizantes, adubos e aumentar areas de produção) para aumentar a quantidade de sua produção. Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 8.500.00mt,10.000.00mt e 15.000.00mt e foi para agro negocio.  

Compromete-se a pagar devidamente para aceder a outros créditos no futuro. Pretende solicitar novos  empréstimos para aumentar as suas areas agricolas assim como apostar na construção.
texts.en:
Alda was born in Inharrime District, Inhambane Province in southern Mozambique. She is married and has 6 children between 21 and 36 years old. The two youngest, who live with her, still go to school. Alda finished 6th grade in the old educational system and did not continue because of financial difficulties. She lives in her own house and supports a grandson and a nephew who live with her.

She left Inharrime to move to Maputo with her family when she was still a child. Now she has a farm of about 2 hectares where she has been growing vegetables with the help of one employee for more than 10 years. Through this work she earns about 3,000 meticais per month, which she uses for household expenses.

Alda has never had loans from other banks. She learned about Hluvuku through coworkers who are customers of this institution. This is Alda's fourth loan with Hluvuku, and she is asking for 20,000 meticais to buy farm supplies (seeds, fertilizer, compost, and increase her area of production) to increase the amount she grows. The earlier loans for 8,500.00 meticais,10,000.00 meticais and 15,000.00 meticais were for agribusiness.

She promises to pay off her loan on time so she can have other loans in the future. Alda intends to ask for more loans both to increase her farmland and to try to start some construction work.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies (seeds, fertilizer, compost and increase area of production)

loans.name: Jackeline

texts.es: Jackeline, de 27 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Víctor de 30 años y sus 2 queridos hijos Hugo de 6 y Virginia de 3 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El negocio al que Jackeline se dedica es la venta de cerveza, gaseosas y hielo, su puesto esta ubicado en su propia casa y todos los fines de semana lleva muchas cajas de cerveza y gaseosas para renovar las que han sido consumidas durante la semana. Ella es una vendedora muy alegre y carismática, por eso sus clientes la prefieren antes que a la competencia. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes, ya que así hace más amenas sus largas jornadas de trabajo, lleva 6 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es trasladar las pesadas cajas de cerveza. Para el futuro, espera poder poner una tienda, donde pueda brindar una mejor atención a sus clientes. Este sería su sexto crédito con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar sus cuotas puntualmente y esta dispuesta a hacerlo, en su banco comunal es una socia muy alegre y colaboradora. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más cajas de cerveza, ya que por estas fechas se incrementa su demanda.
texts.en:
Jackeline, 27 years old, is a very friendly and hardworking woman. She lives in her own house together with her husband Victor, 32, and their two cherished children, Hugo, 6, and Virginia, 3, who she wants to give a better quality of life. 

Jackeline's business is selling beer, sodas and ice from her home. Every weekend she carries a lot of cases of beer and sodas to replace what's been consumed during the week. She is a very happy and charismatic saleswoman, which is why her clients prefer her over the competition. What she likes most about her work is talking with her customers, since it makes her long work shifts seem lighter. She's been doing this for 6 years and thinks the hardest part is transporting the heavy boxes of beer. In the future, she hopes to put in a store where she can give better service to her clients. 

This will be her 6th loan with MFP and she knows that she has to make payments punctually and is ready to do so. She is a happy and cooperative member of her village bank. With the 2,000 nuevos soles requested she will buy more cases of beer, since demand has been increasing lately.

loans.use: to buy more cases of beer.

loans.name: Duo Gema Group

texts.es: Duo Gema: Este Grupo Esta Conformado por dos señoras las cuales esta doña Silvia ella se dedica a la venta de refacciones en la comunidad donde vive, tambien ella cuenta con la ayuda de su esposo que le ayuda a atender a sus clientes, ella nos comenta que gracias a Dios su negocio ba creciendo ella solicita este credito para la compra de productos comestibles para elavorar comida, ya que esta convencida de que nececita mas capital para trabajar,tambien doña Maria se a dedicado a la venta de frutas y verduras por nuchos años y con ese negocio a logrado sacar adelante a su familia ella nos cuenta que todos sus hijos ya estan grandes pero sigue luchando porque tiene a un nieto que vive con ella y todavia esta pequeño ella solicita este credito para la compra de frutas y verduras para surtir su negocio
texts.en:
The Duo Gema group is comprised of two women.  

Silvia sells "refacciones" (sandwiches, soup, salad, snacks) in the community where she lives.  She has her husband’s assistance as he helps her take care of her customers.  She tells us that, thank God, her business is growing.  She is requesting this loan to buy groceries for making food.  She is convinced that she needs more working capital.  

Maria has been selling fruit and vegetables for a long time.  It is through this business that she has managed to get her family ahead.  She tells us that her children are already grown, but she continues to persevere because she has a grandson who lives with her, and he is still young.  She is requesting this loan to buy fruits and vegetables to stock her business.

loans.use: to buy groceries to make food and to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Rosa Narciza

texts.es: La Sra. Rosa Narciza D. 50 años D. edad tiene casa propia la cual se encuentra ubicada en el caserio D. Casablanca. Vive con su hijo. La Sra. Rosa se dedica a la venta D. cerveza desD. hace mas D. 8 años. Está solicitando el crédito para incrementar la compra D. cerveza. Su sueño segun nos comenta es incrementar el negocio. La Sra. está muy agradecida por el apoyo que le podamos brindar a tráves D. este financiamiento.
texts.en: Rosa is 50 years old and has her own home in the hamlet of Casablanca, where she lives with her son. She has maD. a living selling beer for more than eight years. She is requesting the loan to increase her beer purchases. Her dream is to expand her business. Rosa is very grateful for the support we are providing through this loan.

loans.use: to increase her beer purchases.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials (iron, cement, sand, etc.).

loans.name: Vilma Evelia

texts.es: Vilma de 54 años  tiene un negocio de servicios de alquiler de PlayStation, elL. inició esta experiencia hace 15 años, cuando vivía en L. ciudad de Medellín con su esposo y sus dos hijos en las edades de 26 y 29 años. Una vez su esposo falleció llegó al municipio de Malambo a casa de su madre  e inició hace 8 años su negocio donde ofrece alternativas lúdicas a niños y jóvenes a través de videojuegos. Durante muchos años el negocio de Vilma  no tuvo competencia en el sector y lo logró fortalecerlo un poco. Hace corto tiempo un vecino emprendió esta actividad y elL. necesita mejorar el servicio y modernizarlo, para poder competir, por eso recurre a su credikiva para comprar 1 televisor, un XBOX, controles y cassette de juegos y tiene como meta más adelante    mejorar su local. En L. actualidad está solicitando su credikiva para aumentar su capital de trabajo y generar alternativas a sus clientes de acceder a juegos modernos e instructivos.
texts.en: Vilma is 54 years old and has a business renting PlayStations and other video game systems. She started this activity 15 years ago when she was living in the city of Medellín with her husband and their two children, ages 26 and 29. After her husband died she came to the town of Malambo to her mother's home and eight years ago started a business offering recreational options to kids and youths through video games. Over many years Vilma's business did not have any competition and she was able to strengthen it some. A little while ago a neighbor started up a similar business, and Vilma needs to improve her service and modernize so she can compete. For this reason, she is turning to a Kiva loan to purchase a television, an Xbox, controllers and video games, and her goal in the future is to improve her storefront. She is requesting the loan to increase her working capital and generate alternatives for her customers to access modern and educational games.

loans.use: to purchase a television, an Xbox, controllers and video games.

loans.name: Hilario Lucas

texts.pt:
Hilario Lucas nasceu no Distrito de Boane, Provincia de Maputo,Sul de Moçambique, solteiro e pai de 1 filho de 5 anos de idade. Estudou ate a 12ª classe não continuou devido a falta de condições financeiras para ingressar a faculdade. Vive na casa propria e sustenta seus pais e sobrinho que vivem com ele. 

Nunca saiu de Boane, estudou e iniciou sua carreira profissional neste Distrito. Trabalha como funcionario permanente ha mais de 5 anos e tem um salario mensal de 7.997.00mts por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e ainda poupa algum na sua conta bancaria

Nunca  teve emprestimo em outros bancos, conhece a Hluvuku atraves de um colega que é cliente desta instituição. Este é o seu segundo emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 22.000mt com o qual pretende comprar material de construção(chapas de zinco, cimento, areia, pedras  e outros) para continuar com o melhoramento da sua casa. O empréstimo anterior foi de 15.000.00m e foi para habitação.  

Compromete se a pagar devidamente para aceder a outros créditos no futuro.
Pretende solicitar novos  empréstimos para concluir a sua casa, mobilar e iniciar um negocio proprio.
texts.en:
Hilario Lucas was born in Boane District, Maputo Province in southern Mozambique. He is single and has a five-year-old son. Hilario finished 12th grade but did not continue with school because he did not have the money to attend college. He lives in his own house and supports his parents and his nephew, who live with him.

Hilario has never left Boane; he went to school and began his professional career in this District. He has worked as a permanent employee for more than five years and has salary of 7,997.00 meticais per month, which he uses for household expenses. He is also able to save some money in his bank account.

He has never had loans from other banks, and he learned about Hluvuku through a coworker who is a customer of this institution. This is Hilario's second loan with Hluvuku. He is asking for 22,000 meticais to buy construction material (zinc sheets, cement, sand, stone, etc.) to continue improving his house. The earlier loan was for 15,000 meticais and was for housing.

Hilario promises to make his payments on time so he can take out other loans in the future. He intends to ask for new loans so he can finish his house, furnish it and start his own business.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (zinc sheets, cement, sand, stone, etc.)

loans.name: Gricelda

texts.es:
A la vivienda de la señora Gricelda le esta haciendo falta la barda alrededor. 
Esta solicitando un crédito para comprar los block y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de realizar la mejora, ya que en este momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario.  
Doña Gricelda es empleada de una maquiladora como supervisora de producción con una parte de este ingreso pagara el préstamo ya que es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia.
Desea la seguridad y comediada de sus dos hijos que tiene bajo su responsabilizada ya que es madre soltera.
texts.en:
Gricelda's house doesn't have a wall around the outside. She is asking for a loan to buy cinder-block and pay someone to make the improvements, because she doesn't have the necessary cash right now. 

Gricelda is an employee in a factory where she works as a production supervisor. She will pay back the loan with part of this loan, which is her family's income source. 

She wants security and comfort for the two children that she cares for as a single mother.

loans.use: to build a wall around the house.

loans.name: Hotencia De Calidade

texts.pt:
Hortencia de calidade nasceu no Distrito de Buzi, Provincia de Sofala, centro de Moçambique, casada e maê de 2 filhos de 1 e  4 anos idade. Fez 11ª classe parou quando foi fazer o curso de enfermagem. Vive na casa propria com a sua familia e sustenta sua sobrinha que vive com ela, as vezes manda algum dinheiro para os pais em Sofala. 

Saiu de Sofala Para Maputo quando o seu marido foi transferido pela instituição onde trabalha. Trabalha como enfermeira e quadro do Ministerio da Saude ha mais de 2 anos e tem como salario6.778.00mt por mês. Este valor aplica nas despasas de casa, construção da sua residencia e ainda poupa algum na sua conta bancaria.

Teve emprestimos em outros bancos e pagou sem dificuldades, conheceu a Hluvuku atraves de colegas  que tambem são clientes desta instituição. Este é o seu primeiro emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 18.000.00mt com o qual pretende comprar material de construção (aros de porta, cimento, barrotes, chapas de zinco e outros) para continuar com a construção da sua casa. 

Compromete-se a pagar devidamente para aceder a outros créditos no futuro. Pretende solicitar novos  empréstimos para concluir a sua casa e mobilar para oferecer mais conforto a sua familia.
texts.en:
Hortencia de Calidade was born in Buzi District, Sofala Province in central Mozambique. She is married and has 2 children, ages 1 and 4. Hortencia finished 11th grade and stopped school when she started training to be a nurse. She lives in her own house with her family and supports her niece, who lives with her. Sometimes she sends some money to her parents in Sofala. 

She left Sofala to move to Maputo when her husband was transferred by the institution he works for. Hortencia works as a nurse and has been on staff at the Ministry of Health for more than two years. Her salary is 6,778 meticais per month. She uses the money for household expenses and construction on her house, and she also saves some in her bank account.

Hortencia has had loans from other banks, and she paid them off without any problems. She learned about Hluvuku through coworkers who are also customers of this institution. This is her first loan with Hluvuku, and she is asking for 18,000 meticais to buy construction materials (door frames, cement, beams, zinc sheets and other items) to continue work on her house.

She promises to pay off the loan promptly so she can have other loans in the future. She intends to ask for more loans to finish her house and furnish it so she can make her family more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (door frames, cement, beams, zinc sheets, etc.)

loans.name: Imagenn Group

texts.es: Este grupo se llama "IMAGENN", se ubica en el estado de México. Está integrado por 9 clientas, en este grupo se encuentra la señora Atanacia de 61 años de edad, tiene 5 hijos varones. La señora tiene una Tienda de abarrotes desde hace aproximadamente 5 años el cual cuida mucho y quiere hacer crecer. El prestamo que le otorguen le favorá porque asó podra adquirir mercancías como: aceite, azúcar, huevo, arroz, frijol, papel higiénico, servilletas, vasos desechables, jabón, pasta de dientes, sopas, y algo de verduras que necesitan sus clientes diariamente. Espera que su negocio tenga más clientes y pueda darles un mejor servicio, calidad y buen precio. Con las ganancias que obtengan ahorrara una parte para la educación de sus hijos pues le gustaria verlos graduados de la Universidad.
texts.en:
This group, made up of 9 borrowers, is called "IMAGENN" and is located in the state of México. One member is Atancia, 61 years old, with 5 sons. She has a grocery store which for 5 years she has cared for and wanted to make grow. 

The loan that has been awarded to her will help because she will be able to acquire merchandise like: oil, sugar, eggs, rice, beans, toilet paper, napkins, disposable cups, soap, toothpaste, soup and vegetables that her customers need every day. She hopes that her business will have more customers and she will be able to give them better service, quality and good prices. With the earnings that she makes she will save part for her sons' education because she would like to see them graduate from university.

loans.use: to invest in merchandise for a grocery store.

loans.name: True Sisters Group

texts.en:
Mariatu is the leader of this group of entrepreneurs.  She was born about 28 years ago in a town called Kambia. She is married to a businessman and the couple has 2 children who are attending primary school. Mariatu sells margi (used to give sauce a sweet taste), sugar, etc. and has been doing this business for many years now.

With the help of this loan, Mariatu and her group members will be able to expand their businesses, make more sales and consequently improve on their living conditions. Mariatu will use her share of the loan (SLL 1,200,000) to buy margi, sugar, etc. in large quantity to add to her current inventory.

loans.use: buy margi, sugar, etc. to sell

loans.name: Cristina

texts.pt:
Cristina nasceu no Distrito de Boane, Provincia de Maputo, Sul de Moçambique, solteira e maê de 1 filho de 11 anos idade e vai a Escola. Fez 9ª classe parou quando ficou gravida e naõ continuou devido a dificuldades financeiras. Vive na casa propria e sustenta sua maê e uma irma que vivem com ela. 

Nunca saiu da sua cidade natal, tem um negocio proprio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade onde trabalha desde o periodo da manhã ate ao fim do dia e consegue um rendimento de cerca 7.000.00mta por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e ainda poupa algum.

Nunca teve emprestimo em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku atraves de colegas  que tambem são clientes desta instituição. Este é o seu quinto emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000.00mt com o qual pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, barrotes, chapas de zinco, pedra e outros) para continuar com a construção da sua casa. Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 3.500.00mt, 8.000.00,11.000.00mt, 12.000.00me e 12.000.00mt foram para o negocio e habitação.  

Compromete-se a pagar devidamente para aceder a outros créditos no futuro. Pretende solicitar novos  empréstimos para ampliar ainda mais o seu negocio, concluir e mobilar a sua casa.
texts.en:
Cristina was born in Boane District, Maputo Province in southern Mozambique. She is single and has an 11-year-old son who goes to school. Cristina finished 9th grade and quit school when she became pregnant. She did not go back because of financial problems. She lives in her own house and supports her mother and a sister, who both live with her.

Cristina has never left her hometown. She has her own business selling staple goods where she works from morning until day's end. She earns about 7,000 meticais per month, which she uses for household expenses, and she even saves some money.

She has never had loans from other banks, and she learned about Hluvuku through coworkers who are also customers of this institution. This is Cristina's fifth loan with Hluvuku. She is asking for 20,000 meticais to buy construction materials (cement, beams, zinc sheets, stone and other items) to continue building her house. The earlier loans were for 3,5000 meticais, 8,000 meticais, 11,000 meticais and 12,000 meticais and were for her business and for housing.

She promises to make her payments promptly so she can get more loans in the future. Cristina intends to ask for more loans to expand her business even more, finish her house and furnish it.

loans.use: to buy construction materials (cement, beams, zinc sheets, stone, etc.).

loans.name: Kondo Tchilalo

texts.fr: Agée de 34 ans,  kondo  est mariée et mère de 02 enfants. Depuis 1995 elle   s’est lancée dans la fabrication de boisson locale faite à base de mil et très appréciée  par la population. Elle se boit frais ou à température ambiante. Pour maximiser son profit elle vend aussi du mil et des ignames. Elle s’approvisionne de mil à Anié  une localité située au nord de Lomé  dans la région des plateaux revend après  à domicile. Ce  prêt lui servira à acheter du mil  et des ignames  et augmenter le stock existant.
texts.en: Kondo, aged 34, is a woman who is married and the mother of two. In 1995, she began making a local beverage made of millet that is very popular. People drink it chilled or at room temperature. To maximize her profit, she also sells millet and yams. She gets her supplies of millet in Anié, a town located north of Lomé, the capital of Togo, in the plateau region. She then sells out of her house. This loan will be used to buy some millet and yams and to increase her existing inventory.

loans.use: to buy millet and some firewood for making tchouk

loans.name: Didier

texts.fr: Né le 23 mai 1975 au Bénin, Didier est marié à Bernadette. Le couple à sept enfants à charge, dont cinq sont les leurs. Certains des enfants sont scolarisés. Didier et sa femme vivent dans la même maison avec leurs enfants. Didier à arrêté l’école au secondaire, puis a appris la menuiserie, activité qu'il exerce depuis quatorze ans. Parallèlement à cette activité, Didier fait de l'élevage dans sa région. Ces activités lui génèrent des revenus qui lui permettent d’assurer les diverses charges de sa famille. La demande de la clientèle de Didier se fait de plus en plus grande. Ne pouvant pas réunir les moyens financiers nécessaires en vue de satisfaire les commandes de sa clientèle, Didier sollicite un troisième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce crédit lui servira certainement à l'achat de matières premières pour la fabrication des équipements mobiliers des clients.
texts.en:
Born in Benin on May 23, 1975, Didier is married to Bernadette. The couple has seven dependent children, five of whom are their own. Some of the children go to school. Didier and his wife live together with their children. Didier left school in high school. He then learnt woodworking, his business for fourteen years. In addition to this activity, Didier also raises animals in his region. These activities generate sufficient revenues to provide for his family's various expenses.
Demand from Didier's clients is growing. As he cannot come up with the funds necessary to fulfill his customers' orders, Didier is requesting a third loan from ALIDé. This loan will definitely be used to purchase raw material to manufacture furniture for his clients.

loans.use: to purchase timber.

loans.name: Judite Mateus

texts.pt:
Judite Mateus nasceu no Distrito de Manjacaze, Provincia de Gaza, Sul de Moçambique, casada e maê de 3 filhos de idades entre 11 a 19 anos de idade, todos vão a Escola. Fez 7ª classe e naõ continuou devido a dificuldades financeiras. Vive na casa propria e sustenta um sobrinho e seus pais enviando algum valor para as despesas alimentares. 

Saiu de Manjacaze para Maputo para dar continuidade com seus estudos porque na sua zona ja naõ tinha o nivel que ela devia frequentar. Tem um negocio proprio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade ha mais de 10 anos e consegue um rendimento de cerca 10.000.00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e ainda poupa algum na sua conta bancaria.

Nunca  teve emprestimo em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku atraves de colegas que são clientes desta instituição. Este é o seu quarto emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000mt com o qual pretende comprar produtos (oleo, arroz, refrescos, peixe, farinha e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 15.000.00mt,12.000.00mt e 15.000.00mt e foi para agro negocio.  

Compromete-se a pagar devidamente para aceder a outros créditos no futuro. Pretende solicitar novos  empréstimos para adquirir um meio de transporte como forma de facilitar o escoamento da sua mercadoria.
texts.en:
Judite Mateus was born in Manjacaze District, Gaza Province in southern Mozambique. She is married and has three children between 11 and 19 years old. All the children go to school. Judite finished 7th grade but did not continue because of financial problems. She lives in her own house and supports a nephew and her parents by sending them some money for food.

She left Manjacaze to move to Maputo so she could continue her studies, because in her area they did not have the grade she was supposed to be in. She has had her own business selling staple goods for more than 10 years, and her income is around 10,000 meticais per month. She uses the money for household expenses and even saves some in her bank account.

Judite has never had loans from other banks, and she learned about Hluvuku through coworkers who are customers of this institution. This is her fourth loan with Hluvuku, and she is asking for 20,000 meticais. She plans to buy products (oil, rice, soft drinks, fish, flour and other items) to increase her inventory. The earlier loans were for 15,000 meticais, 12,000 meticais and 15,000 meticais and were for the business.

She promises to make her payments promptly so she can get other loans in the future. She intends to take out more loans so she can buy a means of transport as a way to sell her merchandise more easily.

loans.use: to buy products (oil, rice, soft drinks, fish, flour, etc.).

loans.name: Léla

texts.fr: Jeune femme mariée de 29ans  et mère de 01 enfant, Léla est revendeuse de  bonbons de cigarettes et de piles en gros et en détails depuis 2008 et pour les besoins de son commerce elle s’approvisionne à Anié.son mari est chauffeur et pour l’aider dans le ménage, elle se bat au quotidien pour supporter les dépenses  du foyer. Elle aimerait augmenter son stock  et pour cela elle sollicite ce crédit auprès de notre institution.
texts.en: A young woman, 29 years old, and the mother of one child, Léla has been selling candies, cigarettes, and batteries wholesale and retail since 2008. To meet her business needs, she gets her supplies from the town of Anié. Her husband is a chauffeur. To help him at home, she struggles each day to meet household expenses.  She would like to increase her stock of goods, and so she is requesting this loan from our institution.

loans.use: to buy sweets

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa tiene 42 años, es una mujer muy amable y trabajadora, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Wilmer de 40 años y sus 4 queridos hijos, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. La bodega de Rosa es la primera en abrirse en su barrio, desde las 5 de la mañana sus puertas ya están listas para recibir a sus compradores, quienes sabiendo de la variedad de la mercadería que tiene en su bodega no dudan en comprarle, ya que tienen la seguridad de que van a encontrar las cosas que necesitan. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es vender y conversar con su cliente, lleva 20 años en este negocio y considera que lo más difícil es tener que levantarse temprano para abrir su tienda,  aun así sabe que ese es su trabajo y que tiene que hacerlo, espera que en adelante su negocio crezca y le brinde mejores ingresos económicos, por ello espera de su aporte para concretar sus planes. Este será su décimo segundo crédito con MFP, y siempre ha mostrado ser puntual en sus primeros pagos y espera serlo ahora también. En su banco comunal es muy querida por el resto de sus socias, ya que es muy responsable. Con los dos mil nuevos soles solicitados, comprará más productos para implementar mejor su tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Rosa, 42, is a very hardworking and friendly woman. She lives in her own home together with her husband Wilmer, 40, and their four cherished children, who they want to give a better quality of life. Rosa's grocery store is the first to open in her neighborhood - from 5:00am her doors are open to receive customers. They know the variety of merchandise that she has in her store and don't hesitate to buy from her, since they have the security of knowing they'll find what they need. 

What she likes most about her work is selling and talking with her customers. She has been in this business for 20 years and considers the toughest part to be getting up early to open her store, but even so she knows that it's her job and she has to do it. She hopes that in the future her business will grow and bring in more income; for this reason she hopes that the loan will help to solidify her plans. 

This will be her 12th loan with MFP and she has always proven to be punctual in making her payments and expects she will be now, too. In her village bank she is very dear to the rest of her members because she is very responsible. With the 2,000 nuevos soles that she requested, she will buy more products to better stock her grocery store.

loans.use: to buy products to stock her store.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Elena tiene 66 años D. edad, vive con su esposo en el caserío Pueblo Libre ubicado en el distrito TambogranD. – Piura. La comunidad donD. Elena vive es pequeña y rural, D. condición baja y las principales actividades que se desarrollan dentro D. ella es la agricultura y ganadería. 

La actividad  a la que Elena se dedica, es la venta D. cosméticos por catalogo, hace 2 campañas por mes y tiene una experiencia D. 5 años en este negocio. Recorre varios caseríos en los cuales deja sus productos y cobra en la quincena o fin D. mes. También se dedica a la crianza D. ganado ovino, los cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado local.

Su esposo es agricultor con parcela propia, en la cual siembra Mango y Limón, ambos cultivos en producción y bien conducidos.

Elena solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1000 nuevos soles que destinará en la compra D. cosméticos que se encuentran en oferta y que podrán ampliar su stock para lograr mayores ventas y por lo tanto más ganancias.

Elena es una cliente conocida para nuestra entidad, siendo este su segundo crédito, el anterior lo pago responsable y puntualmente.
texts.en:
Elena tiene 66 años D. edad, vive con su esposo en el caserío Pueblo Libre ubicado en el distrito TambogranD. – Piura. La comunidad donD. Elena vive es pequeña y rural, D. condición baja y las principales actividades que se desarrollan dentro D. ella es la agricultura y ganadería. 

La actividad  a la que Elena se dedica, es la venta D. cosméticos por catalogo, hace 2 campañas por mes y tiene una experiencia D. 5 años en este negocio. Recorre varios caseríos en los cuales deja sus productos y cobra en la quincena o fin D. mes. También se dedica a la crianza D. ganado ovino, los cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado local.

Su esposo es agricultor con parcela propia, en la cual siembra Mango y Limón, ambos cultivos en producción y bien conducidos.

Elena solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1000 nuevos soles que destinará en la compra D. cosméticos que se encuentran en oferta y que podrán ampliar su stock para lograr mayores ventas y por lo tanto más ganancias.

Elena es una cliente conocida para nuestra entidad, siendo este su segundo crédito, el anterior lo pago responsable y puntualmente.

loans.use: Comprar productos en oferta y ampliar stock.

loans.name: Gilberto Armindo

texts.pt:
Gilberto Armindo nasceu no Distrito de Vilanculos, Provincia de Inhambane, Sul de Moçambique, casado e pai de 3 filhos de idades entre 1 a 7 anos de idade, apenas o mais velho vai a Escola. Fez 8ª classe e naõ continuou devido a dificuldades financeiras por parte de seus pais. Vive na casa propria e sustenta 3 sobrinhos que vivem com ele. 

Saiu de Vilanculos para Maputo aprocura de melhores condições de vida. Tarabalha numa empresa como temporario ha mais de 5 anos e possui um negocio de venda de produtos de primeira necessidade onde consegue um rendimento de cerca 10.000.00mta 12.000.00mt por mês que aplica nas despesas de casa e ainda poupa alguma parte  na sua conta bancaria.

Nunca  teve emprestimo em outros bancos, conheceu a Hluvuku atraves amigos e colegas de serviço que tambem são clientes desta instituição. Este é o seu terceiro emprestimo na Hluvuku no valor de 20.000mt com o qual pretende comprar produtos (Massas, caldos, arroz, refrescos, peixe, farinha e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. Os empréstimos anteriores foram de 9.000.00mt e 15.000.00mt e todos foram para agro negocio.  

Compromete-se a pagar devidamente para aceder a outros créditos no futuro. Pretende solicitar novos  empréstimos para ampliar ainda mais o seu negocio, porque este é a base da sua vida.
texts.en:
Gilberto Armindo was born in Vilanculos District, Inhambane Province in southern Mozambique. He is married and has 3 children between 1 and 7 years old. Only the eldest goes to school. Gilberto finished 6th grade but did not continue because of his parents' financial problems. He lives in his own house and supports three relatives (nephews or nieces) who live with him.

He left Vilanculos to move to Maputo in search of better living conditions. He has worked for a company as a provisional worker for more than five years and also has his own business selling staple goods, which earns him about 10,000 to 12,000 meticais per month. He uses the money for household expenses and also saves some in his bank account.

Gilberto has never had loans from other banks, and he learned about Hluvuku through coworkers who are also customers of this institution. This is his third loan with Hluvuku. He is asking for 20,000 meticais to buy products (pasta, soups, rice, soft drinks, fish, rice and other items) to increase his inventory. The earlier loans were for 9,000 meticais and 15,000 meticais and were both for his business.

He promises to make his payments promptly so he can take out other loans in the future. He intends to ask for more loans to expand his business more because it is the basis of his life.

loans.use: to buy products (pasta, soups, rice, soft drinks, fish, flour, etc.).

loans.name: Maria Nancy

texts.es:
Nancy tiene 32 años de edad, ella vive con su familia en la zona rural del distrito de Lambayeque, en una comunidad pequeña en vías de desarrollo y con muchos deseos de superarse.

Nancy es una madre de familia, que tiene dos hijos en edad escolar y por los que ella trabaja con dedicación. Nancy se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado ovino, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 10 años en su propio domicilio y conoce el rubro a la perfección. Adicionalmente, Nancy vende  bebidas (gaseosas, agua)  heladas, lo cual le trae algunos ingresos. Nancy cuenta con clientela establecida en ambos negocios.

Ella ha logrado ahorrar para ir mejorando su calidad de vida. Sin embargo, aún le quedan cosas pendientes por hacer. Por ello  Nancy solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que destinará en la compra de materiales para ponerle piso a su sala y comedor.

Nancy estaría muy agradecida de concedérsele el crédito pues le ayudaría a mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Nancy tiene 32 años de edad, ella vive con su familia en la zona rural del distrito de Lambayeque, en una comunidad pequeña en vías de desarrollo y con muchos deseos de superarse.

Nancy es una madre de familia, que tiene dos hijos en edad escolar y por los que ella trabaja con dedicación. Nancy estaría muy agradecida de concedérsele el crédito pues le ayudaría a mejorar su calidad de vida.

loans.use: Colocar piso a sala y comedor.

loans.name: Agueda De Jesus

texts.es: Agueda De Jesús tiene 56 años, su actividad es la venta de leña y tiste, tiene más 13 años en su negocio. Ella tiene varios créditos con Fundación León 2000, se siente muy contenta con la oportunidad que le han brindado para salir adelante con su negocio, siempre se ha caracterizado por ofrecer a sus clientes un servicio muy dedicado. La necesidad de proveer a su familia ingreso ha hecho que inicia con este negocio es por eso que solicita este crédito con el fin de invertir en la compra de leña, tiste ya que quiere obtener algo de ganancias para pagar las cuotas y comer diariamente.
texts.en: Agueda De Jesús is 56 years old.  Her business is selling firewood and 'tiste' (a traditional drink).  She has more than 13 years experience in her business.  She has received several loans from Fundación Leon 2000 and feels very happy with the opportunity that they have given her to get ahead in her business.  Agueda has always been noted for offering her customers a very dedicated service.  She started this business because she needed to provide income for her family.  She is requesting this loan to invest in buying firewood and 'tiste' since she would like to make profits with which to pay back her loan and eat every day.

loans.use: to buy firewood and 'tiste'

loans.name: Doraliza

texts.es:
Doraliza es una mujer trabajadora D. 55 años D. edad, ella vive con su esposo en el distrito D. Olmos en Lambayeque.  Doraliza vive en el centro D. la ciudad y por lo tanto cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. 

Doraliza se dedica a la venta al por mayor y menor D. cerveza, tiene varios años D. experiencia en este negocio  que le ha traído bastantes satisfacciones. Con el dinero obtenido D. este negocio Doraliza ayuda a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y juntos tienen muchos deseos D. mejorar su calidad D. vida y salir adelante.

Doraliza solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1000 nuevos soles que invertirá en la compra D. cervezas para aumentar su mercadería. Así como en la ambientación D. su puesto.

Doraliza es una cliente recurrente D. nuestra institución que goza D. buenas referencias.
texts.en:
Doraliza es una mujer trabajadora D. 55 años D. edad, ella vive con su esposo en el distrito D. Olmos en Lambayeque.  Doraliza vive en el centro D. la ciudad y por lo tanto cuenta con todos los servicios básicos. 

Doraliza se dedica a la venta al por mayor y menor D. cerveza, tiene varios años D. experiencia en este negocio  que le ha traído bastantes satisfacciones. Con el dinero obtenido D. este negocio Doraliza ayuda a su esposo con los gastos del hogar y juntos tienen muchos deseos D. mejorar su calidad D. vida y salir adelante.

Doraliza solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1000 nuevos soles que invertirá en la compra D. cervezas para aumentar su mercadería. Así como en la ambientación D. su puesto.

Doraliza es una cliente recurrente D. nuestra institución que goza D. buenas referencias.

loans.use: Comprar cervezas y ambientar puesto.

loans.name: Dagbozounkou Dénagan

texts.fr: Né en 1963 au Bénin, Dagbozounkou Dénagan est marié à un certain Houmè. Le couple a six enfants à charge dont cinq sont les leurs. Certains des enfants sont scolarisés. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Dagbozounkou Dénagan n’a pas fréquenté l'école. Pour assurer les besoins de sa famille, Dagbozounkou Dénagan a appris le métier de maçonnerie ; métier qu’il exerce passionnément depuis près de vingt huit ans. De façon secondaire Dagbozounkou Dénagan fait de l’agriculture. Pour améliorer ses prestations et se faire plus de revenus, Dagbozounkou Dénagan à besoin de plus d'instruments de maçonnerie. Dagbozounkou Dénagan s’approvisionne au Nigéria, État voisin du Bénin, et fournit ses prestations sur plusieurs chantiers. En vue de mieux satisfaire la demande de sa clientèle, Dagbozounkou Dénagan sollicite pour une seconde fois, l'appui financier de ALIDé. Le premier crédit reçu à été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
Born in Benin in 1963, Dagbozounkou Dénagan is married to Houmè. The couple has six dependent children, five of whom are their own. Some of the children go to school. The couple provides for the household's various expenses together. Dagbozounkou Dénagan never went to school. To provide for his family, Dagbozounkou Dénagan learnt the trade of a mason; he has been practicing it with passion for close to twenty-eight years. In addition, Dagbozounkou Dénagan grows crops.
To improve his services and increase his revenues, Dagbozounkou Dénagan needs more masonry tools. Dagbozounkou Dénagan gets his supplies in Nigeria, a state adjacent to Benin, and offers his services on several sites. In order to better meet the demand from his customers, Dagbozounkou Dénagan is requesting ALIDé's financial support for the second time. The first loan he received was repaid correctly.

loans.use: to purchase wheelbarrows, trowels, etc.

loans.name: Natacha Diane

texts.fr:
Jeune femme de 37ans, mariée et  mère de 5enfants qui,  après ses études universitaires en 2007, ouvre une mini alimentation  à son domicile pour subvenir aux besoins de famille.
Sa boutique  qu’elle ouvre très tôt le matin  reçoit au quotidien ses voisins qui sont ses premiers clients pour acheter  du pains et tout ce qu'il faut pour le petit déjeuner.
Elle a des recettes qui sont entre 30000F et 76000F par jour selon les périodes.
Avec le prêt actuel, elle veut augmenter son stock de marchandise en achetant : 5 packs d’eau minérale, 2cartons de sardines à huile, 2cartons de spaghetti, 5 lots de papiers hygiéniques, 1carton de lait en poudre, 1carton de margarine, 1sac de sucre, 10lots de sachets d’emballage.
Dans l’espoir d’ouvrir une grande alimentation, elle veut améliorer sa boutique en mettant plus les produits de première nécessité pour  vendre et réaliser plus de bénéfices.
Mère de famille, elle contribue aussi à l’éducation scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Natacha Diane is a young woman of 37, married, and the mother of five children. After her university studies in 2007, she opened a mini-grocery at her home to meet her family's needs.

Her shop, which she opens very early in the morning, receives daily visits from her neighbors, who are her first clients to buy bread and breakfast items.

She has a gross revenue between 30,000 and 76,000 F per day, depending on the period. With this loan she would like to increase her stock by purchasing 5 cases of water, 2 cases of sardines in oil, 2 cases of spaghetti, 5 packs of toilet paper, 1 case of powdered milk, 1 case of margarine, 1 bag of sugar, and 10 bundles of grocery bags. 

Hoping to open a large grocery, she would like to improve her shop by offering more necessity items to sell and make more profit. A mother, she also helps to pay for her children's schooling.

loans.use: to purchase water, powdered milk, sugar, sardines, spaghetti, and margarine.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes tiene 20 años de edad, es madre soltera y  vive en casa de sus padres con su menor hija, en una comunidad pequeña y rural llamada San Pedrillo ubicada en el  distrito de Tambogrande – Piura. 

Mercedes cuenta con un pequeño restaurante de comida marina que esta adecuadamente condicionado (ambiente y materiales) y en el cual atiende permanentemente. Tiene una experiencia de 4 años en el negocio y cuenta con clientes ya establecidos en la zona.

Mercedes tiene muchos deseos de superación y tiene planeado expandir su negocio. Para lograr sus metas Mercedes desea obtener mayores ingresos  que se lo permitan. Por ello solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que invertirá en la compra de cervezas y mejoras en el local, lo que le permitirá tener clientes que visiten su restaurante frecuentemente. Esto le traerá ganancias que podrán ayudarla a cumplir sus objetivos.

Mercedes, es una clienta conocida para Edpyme Alternativa, este su tercer crédito con nosotros y somos la única entidad con la cual trabaja, es una clienta recurrente y  todas sus cuotas anteriores las pagó puntualmente.
texts.en:
Mercedes tiene 20 años de edad, es madre soltera y  vive en casa de sus padres con su menor hija, en una comunidad pequeña y rural llamada San Pedrillo ubicada en el  distrito de Tambogrande – Piura. 

Mercedes cuenta con un pequeño restaurante de comida marina que esta adecuadamente condicionado (ambiente y materiales) y en el cual atiende permanentemente. Tiene una experiencia de 4 años en el negocio y cuenta con clientes ya establecidos en la zona.

Mercedes tiene muchos deseos de superación y tiene planeado expandir su negocio. Para lograr sus metas Mercedes desea obtener mayores ingresos  que se lo permitan. Por ello solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que invertirá en la compra de cervezas y mejoras en el local, lo que le permitirá tener clientes que visiten su restaurante frecuentemente. Esto le traerá ganancias que podrán ayudarla a cumplir sus objetivos.

Mercedes, es una clienta conocida para Edpyme Alternativa, este su tercer crédito con nosotros y somos la única entidad con la cual trabaja, es una clienta recurrente y  todas sus cuotas anteriores las pagó puntualmente.

loans.use: Comprar cerveza y mejorar local.

loans.name: Sopey Khaleyi Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité SOPEY KHALEYI est créé le 11 mai 2010 veille de l'inauguration; il est composé de quinze femmes qui sont parentes et habitent le même village. Les principales activités qu'elles mènent sont la transformation artisanale de l'huile d'arachide et le petit commerce.


Fatou la responsable est âgée de 50 ans mariée avec treize enfants en charge dont deux nièces et deux neveux. 

Elle mène une activité de transformation d'huile d'arachide et le petit commerce. Elle fait parallèlement de l'embouche ovine. Elle s’approvisionne aux marchés hebdomadaires( arachide, haricot et moutons). Elle est debout à gauche de la photo et à levé la main.


son prêt lui permettra d'augmenter ses produits afin de gagner plus de revenus.


Elle se partage les dépenses de la maison avec sa coépouse leur mari étant vieux. Elle souhaite aussi augmenter son épargne.
texts.en:
The SOPEY KHALEYI solidarity group was created May 11, 2010, the day before the inauguration. It is made up of fifteen women who are related and live in the same village. Their main activities are the artisan transformation of peanut oil and retail.

Fatou, the organizer, is 50 years old and married with thirteen dependent children, including her two nieces and two nephews.

She is active in the processing of peanut oil and in retailing. She also does ovine fattening. She gets her supplies (peanuts, beans, and sheep) from weekly markets. She is standing on the left of the picture with her hand raised.

Her loan will allow her to increase her productions to make a larger profit.

She splits the expenses of the household with her co-wife, as their husband is old. She also wants to increase her savings.

loans.use: to purchase peanuts and beans for retail.

loans.name: Julia Antonieta

texts.es:
Julia de 46 años, vive en una zona urbana en las Orquídeas (llamado así porque en su originalidad había muchas flores orquídeas) de Guayaquil. Es soltera y tiene dos hijos de 18 y 10 años, se dedica a la venta de ropa y cosméticos por catálogos.

Primero fue el negocio en la bahía y sus hijos se enfermaban y no había quien los cuidaran en eso opto por tener un negocio que no le quite el tiempo y escogió la ventas de ropa por catálogos. Con la ayuda del préstamo desea comprar mercadería de ropa y productos de bellezas para aumentar sus ganancias. Ella anhela alquilar un local para poder exhibir sus mercadería.
texts.en:
Julia is 46 years old.  She lives in an urban area of Las Orquídeas de Guayaquil (which is so called because there used to be a lot of orchids found there).  She is single and has two children aged 18 and 10.  Julia sells clothes and cosmetics through catalogs.

Originally, her business was in the bay area.  Her children got sick and she didn't have anybody to look after them so she chose to have a business that didn't take up all her time.  She chose to sell clothes through catalogs.  With the help of this loan, Julia would like to buy clothes and beauty products to increase her profits.  She would really like to rent sales premises so that she can display her merchandise.

loans.use: to buy catalog clothes and beauty products to sell

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen tiene  27 años de edad y es madre soltera de un pequeño niño. Ellos viven en una comunidad urbana en vías de desarrollo llamada La Victoria en Chiclayo, esta es una comunidad principalmente de comerciantes. Carmen es una mujer que lucha por el bienestar de su hijo y espera superarse económicamente por el bien de este.

La actividad a la que se dedica, principalmente, es la recolección de chatarra y su comercialización. Sin embargo, Carmen también cría animales para luego comercializarlos. Ella se dedica desde hace 7 años a realizar dichas actividades y su esfuerzo le ha podido dar algunas comodidades.

Carmen solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que invertirá en sus dos labores. Una parte será para la compra de chatarra (botellas y latas) que luego comercializará y otra parte será para comprar algunos animales y alimento balanceado para estos. Esto le permitirá a Carmen tener mayores ingresos y reducir el tiempo de sus actividades para poder cuidar a su menor hijo.

Para este rubro (recolección de chatarra) Carmen no tiene mayor competencia en su zona y por lo tanto cuenta con clientela fija.
texts.en:
Carmen tiene  27 años de edad y es madre soltera de un pequeño niño. Ellos viven en una comunidad urbana en vías de desarrollo llamada La Victoria en Chiclayo, esta es una comunidad principalmente de comerciantes. Carmen es una mujer que lucha por el bienestar de su hijo y espera superarse económicamente por el bien de este.

La actividad a la que se dedica, principalmente, es la recolección de chatarra y su comercialización. Sin embargo, Carmen también cría animales para luego comercializarlos. Ella se dedica desde hace 7 años a realizar dichas actividades y su esfuerzo le ha podido dar algunas comodidades.

Carmen solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que invertirá en sus dos labores. Una parte será para la compra de chatarra (botellas y latas) que luego comercializará y otra parte será para comprar algunos animales y alimento balanceado para estos. Esto le permitirá a Carmen tener mayores ingresos y reducir el tiempo de sus actividades para poder cuidar a su menor hijo.

Para este rubro (recolección de chatarra) Carmen no tiene mayor competencia en su zona y por lo tanto cuenta con clientela fija.

loans.use: Comprar chatarra  y animales.

loans.name: Maria Ester

texts.es:
María Ester de 22 años,  vive en una zona urbana en las Orquídeas (llamado así porque en su originalidad había muchas flores orquídeas) de Guayaquil. Es soltera  joven emprendedora que tiene un gabinete de bellezas.

Empezó su negocio de belleza por medio de su mama y ella era su ayudante principiante hasta que un día se convirtieron en socia y desde ese entonce le gusta esa profesión. Labora junto con su mama de 9H00 am a 10H00 pm. Con la ayuda del préstamo quiere compra mas productos de bellezas  y muebles para su local. Ella anhela tener su propio gabinete con todos los implemento necesarios.
texts.en:
María Ester is 22 years old and lives in an urban area of Las Orquídeas (so called because there used to be many orchids found there), in Guayaquil.  She is a single, entrepreneurial young woman who has a beauty salon.

María started her beauty business through her mom.  She was her assistant until the day she became a partner in the business and from that moment on she has enjoyed working in this profession.  She works together with her mom from 9.00am to 10.00pm.  With the help of this loan, she would like to buy more beauty products and furniture for her premises.  She dreams of owning her own beauty salon with all the tools she needs.

loans.use: to buy beauty products and furniture for her salon

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials (door frames, cement, beams, zinc sheets, etc.).

loans.name: Angel Miguel

texts.es: Angel  vive en el barrio Soledad 2000 con su cónyuge y tiene un negocio, su experiencia data de hace 20 años cuando trabajó en ese oficio y al emprender  su negocio hace 8, aprovechó su gran conocimiento en esa actividad para mantener la estabilidad de su negocio, reflejada actualmente en el sostenimiento de un importante número de  clientes fijos. Su meta es adquirir  su propio local por eso planea persistir en ideal de negocio, incrementando su capital de trabajo para lograr su sueño. Este es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo con el cual comprará  materias primas en mayor volumen para producir productos derivados de la harina de trigo, pues se proyecta un aumento de estos insumos y quiere adquirirlos antes de que ocurra; así mismo comprará víveres, abarrotes, refrescos, pues  está muy atento a tener surtido su negocio con lo que requiere su clientela,  en fechas especiales como la que se acerca : El día del padre, época en la cual su negocio tiene gran movilidad comercial.
texts.en: Angel lives in the community of Soledad 2000 with his common-law partner. He has a business. His experience dates back 20 years when he started working in this business, but he has had his own business for the past 8 years. He profited from his extensive knowledge in the field to maintain the stability of his business and it is reflected in the considerable number of steady clients. His goal is to have his own store space and this is why he plans on maintaining his business in the ideal and to increase his working capital. This is the first loan he has had with Fundacion Mario Santo Domingo (Kiva Field Partner) and he will purchase ingredients in larger quantities to make wheat products. There is a projected increase in price of these ingredients and he wants to acquire them before this happens. He will also purchase food products, grocery products and soft drinks. He is very concerned in keeping his business well stocked with what his clients require. During special days, as the one approaching, Father's Day, is when he has more business.

loans.use: to purchase larger quantities of ingredients such as wheat products, food products, grocery store proudcts, and soft drinks.

loans.name: Missebo Group

texts.fr: MISSEBO est un groupe constitué de trois personnes et dont la présidente (celle qui a la main levée sur la photo) se nomme Josephine. Les membres du groupe vivent dans le même quartier au Bénin et mènent certaines activités ensemble. Dans le but d’augmenter leur fonds de roulement, ce groupe sollicite pour la deuxième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Josephine est née en 1975 au Bénin et est mariée à un certain  Joel, un cultivateur. Le couple a six enfants tous à charges. Certains des enfants ne sont pas scolarisés. Après avoir arrêté l’école au primaire, Josephine vend de l’huile de palme qu'elle produit elle-même grâce aux noix de palme qu'elle achète. A côté de cette activité, Josephine vend des boissons, de la farine de manioc et de l'huile à moteur à son domicile. Josephine exerce ce métier depuis près de quinze ans, ce qui lui permet ensemble avec son mari,  d’assurer les diverses charges de la famille. Josephine s’approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin.
